title.rendered: 12 Outdoor Heaters to Make the Most of a Terrace in Winter: Mezzaluna Artisan Fire Bowl Featured on ArchitecturalDigest.com

content.rendered:
The online edition of Architectural Digest featured the Mezzaluna Artisan Fire Bowl in an editorial piece on outdoor heaters titled, “12 Outdoor Heaters to Make the Most of a Terrace in Winter.” The editor states:

“Plenty of guests can gather around the 48-inch-diameter Mezzaluna Artisan Fire Bowl by Eldorado Stone. It looks like soft limestone, but it’s actually extra-durable fiberglass concrete.”

It looks like soft limestone, […]
